ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] rathe mtns question
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, that explains it -- killed 5 giant Skellies but ignored the (green) bears and lizardmen -- Thanks;-) ...
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, that explains it -- killed 5 giant Skellies but
ignored the (green) bears and lizardmen --

Thanks;-)


--- Stephane Lange <slange@...> wrote:
>
> Yes, you should kill the bears, the lizardmen and
> the giant squel.
> They all share the same spawn.
>
>
> -----Message d'origine-----
> De : Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
> Envoy´┐¢ : lundi 31 juillet 2000 14:09

> Hi all,
>
> Just started charm kiting in the Rathe Mtns. Last
> night the cyclops were spawning 4 and 5 at a
> time....this morning there were none at all and they
> didn't spawn for the hour or so I played before
> going
> to work. Is there a placeholder for the cyclops in
> this zone?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
> All ready to charm and no clops to kill
